html: Paul may have been quoting a part of this verse in Rom. 9:28 in referring to a "short work" upon the earth. Isaiah uses the word "consumption." Paul was quoting Isaiah 10:22 in Rom. 9:27 and seemed to be continuing in verse 28 (compare Isaiah 10:23 and 28:22; the rest of this prophecy concerning the remnant's return may also have been in the original Isaiah chapter 10). Both Paul and Isaiah were speaking within the context of a prophecy concerning latter-day restoration.
